title: Lab Methodology
description: Course will equip students with advanced skills and knowledge in experimental methodologies across biological disciplines. Topics include advanced instrumentation, quantitative methodologies, and cutting-edge experimental techniques. Emphasis will be placed on critical thinking and problem-solving in the lab. Students will sharpen analytical skills through practical exercises while fostering independent research proficiency. May be taken for credit up to three times. Students must be admitted to the biological sciences MS program; restricted to major code BI84. Students will use their own laptops.
